name: Avalon Toolbox
description:
A simple interface to assist players of Avalon:Resistance and Resistance (with roles included) to announce how the various roles interact and associated start-of-game interactions. This app will help prevent you from inadvertently revealing your role while saying the start-of-game script.

You can use a male, female, or your voice (or a friend's) to say the script.

You can also use this tool to keep track of your game, including statistical tracking.

If something is not working or if you want an improvement made then please contact me at daturk60@gmail.com.

Thank you to Natalie F. Jones for voice work. Contact her at natfjones@gmail.com for vocal work.
